title: The puritaine or The vviddovv of VVatling-streete Acted by the Children of Paules. Written by W.S.
author: W. S.
notes: Sometimes attributed to Thomas Middleton and to Wentworth Smith; misattributed to William Shakespeare.
Running title reads: The puritaine widdow.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
